Merry Christmas and Happy New Year, Commandant! \nBabylonia has prepared special gifts for you to celebrate! Login everyday to claim the sign-in reward. You can get generous special rewards such as Liv: Eclipse Limited Coating, 5★ Memories, Serum, and other items.

Collect sign-in rewards when you log into the game everyday.\nGet Yuanxiao Memory on the 3rd and 7th days.\nHappy Yuanxiao Festival, Commandant! The WGAA is hosting a quiz party with the theme of art history. Would you like to come with me? —Ayla

Let's celebrate the 100-DAY ANNIVERSARY of the Punishing: Gray Raven official launch! And also, HAPPY HALLOWEEN! \nLogin everyday during the event period to claim generous rewards and exclusive 5★ Memory [Lucia: Summer Daze]!

We've walked through half a year together, Commandant. How time flies! Thank you for accompanying Punishing: Gray Raven! \nTo show our gratitude, we provide a special 5-days sign-in reward. Login everyday then you can claim the following rewards: Target Weapon R&D Ticket, Event Construct R&D Ticket, new Dorm Furniture, and so on.
Lantern Festival, a special day in Eastern culture. Hope the thoughts of the young girl can be turned into courage and motivation on the battlefield.
Happy White Day, Commandants!\nLog in every day during the event period to claim sign-in rewards, including rare item: White Affection, Basic Construct R&D Tickets, etc.

Participate in the [Kowloong Bygone] additional sign-in event to claim rewards every day! \nLog in for 5 days totally during the event to join the lucky draw. Rewards like PlayStation 5, Lucia: Dawn figures, collaboration gaming mouse and mouse pad are waiting for you!
